info.name: Dark Los Angeles (LA) Times
info.description: Save your eyesight with this ultra-dark style that removes much of the glaring bright white background on the LA Times's latimes.com. I am igor at http://techlorebyigor.blogspot.com and I code dark styles for several web sites. Wherever there is white, let us replace that with black. L.A. Times, I been done lernt you a lesson. You gots to lern.
